blog.name: thegeekembassy
blog.title: The Geek Embassy
blog.description:
The ambassadors of Geek Embassy endeavor to share all types of geeky passions with our community. As a group, we write individually but we come together to share our collective experiences with different media. For TGE Watches, we talk about movies and TV shows. TGE Plays, we play games together. For TGE Reads, we select a book, read it, and then discuss it together. We are hoping through our collective knowledge and know-how to share these geeky interests with our readers, viewers, and listeners. 

Listen to our podcast at https://www.thegeekembassy.com/category/podcast

title: Captain Marvel: New Trailer Breakdown
body:
Captain Marvel: New Trailer Breakdown

Hooo, boy!  Last night, Marvel Studios treated us to a brand new trailer for the 20th film of the Marvel Cinematic Universe: Captain Marvel. We’ve talked about Captain Marvel before on this site, and this extended trailer continues to promise a spacefaring epic about an amnesiac fighter pilot from Earth. Let’s take a dive into the trailer and see what we learned.

It’s Marvel.  They’re all quippy.

View On WordPress

slug: 外媒指出漫威將籌劃首位華裔超級英雄電影上氣shang-chi以李小龍為藍本的功夫大師
summary: 外媒指出漫威將籌劃首位華裔超級英雄電影《上氣Shang-Chi》以李小龍為藍本的功夫大師
title: 外媒指出漫威將籌劃首位華裔超級英雄電影《上氣Shang-Chi》以李小龍為藍本的功夫大師
body:
根據外媒《Deadline》指出，Marvel漫威將籌備以華裔演員主演的超級英雄電影《上氣Shang-Chi》。編劇已經物色到適當人選，是華裔美籍、編寫預計於2020年上映的《神力女超人1984》大衛卡拉漢（David Callaham）擔任編劇，進一步資訊就請玩家們隨時鎖定我們的報導了。 (more…)

View On WordPress

summary: There are certain people in this world that are true visionaries. That break the mold. When someone tells them not to do...
caption:
There are certain people in this world that are true visionaries. That break the mold. When someone tells them not to do something because it goes against the norm they delve right into it! ⁣
⁣
Stan Lee was one of these amazing individuals! He has inspired millions and I am thankfully one of them! ⁣
⁣
I am so proud of this drawing! If you’re interested in a Print File please message me! ⁣
⁣
This is my tribute to the great Stan Lee!⁣
⁣

summary: я чуть не умерла от радости, когда смотрела трейлер фильма Капитан Марвел и я хз че со мной будет, когда выпустят трейлер...
body:
я чуть не умерла от радости, когда смотрела трейлер фильма Капитан Марвел и я хз че со мной будет, когда выпустят трейлер Мстителей 4 а он не за горами ЛЮДИ ПОМОГИТЕ Я ПРОСТО НЕ ВЫЖИВУ Я УМРУ ОТ РАДОСТИ А ВЕДЬ ОТ ТРЕЙЛЕРА К КАПИТАНУ МАРВЕЛ ЕЩЕ НЕ ОТОШЛА ВЫ ШО ТАК ЕЩЕ И ПАУЧОК ВДАЛИ ОТ ДОМА БУДЕТ НА ЭТОЙ НЕДЕЛЕ ВРОДЕ БЫ

НУ МАРВЕЛ, НУ ДАЕТЕ!

blog.name: care-devil
blog.title: She Cares for the Devil
blog.description: E. - 25 - French. This blog is dedicated to Marvel's Daredevil and more precisely Karedevil (Matt&Karen). Season 3 ✓

summary: You love Daredevil. You want it back. But you don’t really know what to do, or you’re feeling discouraged. Don’t be.
title: You love Daredevil. You want it back. But you don’t really know what to do, or you’re feeling discouraged. Don’t be.
body:
There are many things you can do. As a fan, you do have a voice. You have to start using it if you want to make a difference. Everyone has to do their share. We have to stick together.

Please visit this website: it’ll tell you what you can do, and how.

Basically, you can:

  1. Tweet, of course! Consider creating an account if you don’t have one already. 
  2. Write a letter/email to Marvel
  3. Send Marvel a napkin as part of #OperationNapkins! EVEN IF YOU DON’T LIVE IN THIS U.S. This particular action is, I think, the most powerful one, especially if many people from all over the world do it!
  4. Sign the petition and SHARE IT. We’re close to 11,500 signatures, which is great… But not that much when you think about it. There’s more of us. WAY MORE. 

Whatever you do, share it. Reblog, retweet. Now is not the time to feel sad and nostalgic. It’s not over. We’re still fighting. You’re not alone.

If you love Daredevil, get back in the saddle and fight with us.
